mapper.update: update T_MAP_DIMCODE set DIM_CODE = #{dimCode}, CREATED = sysdate where DIM_CODE_MAP_ID = #{mapId}
mapper.select: select A.DETAIL_TYPE,A.DIM_TYPE, B.DIM_CODE_MAP_ID, B.DETAIL_CODE, E.DETAIL_CODE_NAME,B.DIM_CODE, D.DIM_CODE_NAME, to_char(B.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') CREATED from T_MAP_DIMTYPE A INNER JOIN T_MAP_DIMCODE B ON A.DIM_TYPE = B.DIM_TYPE AND A.DETAIL_TYPE = B.DETAIL_TYPE LEFT JOIN T_FROM_DETAILCODE E ON A.DETAIL_TYPE = E.DETAIL_TYPE AND B.DETAIL_CODE = E.DETAIL_CODE AND E.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE = 1 LEFT JOIN T_TO_DIMCODE D ON A.DIM_TYPE = D.DIM_TYPE AND B.DIM_CODE = D.DIM_CODE AND D.APP_SET_CODE = 1 where A.map_set_code = 1 AND B.MAP_SET_CODE = 1 AND A.DETAIL_TYPE = #{DETAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DIM_TYPE = #{DIM,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.DETAIL_CODE = #{CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.ACCOUNT_MAP_ID, A.ACCOUNT_CODE_FROM, A.ACCOUNT_CODE_TO, A.COEF, A.DATA_FETCH, A.DATA_TYPE, A.CURRENCY_TYPE, A.DETAIL_CODE1, A.DETAIL_CODE2, A.DETAIL_CODE3, A.DETAIL_CODE4, A.DETAIL_CODE5, A.DETAIL_CODE6, A.DETAIL_CODE7, A.DETAIL_CODE8, A.DIM_01, A.DIM_02, A.DIM_03, A.DIM_04, A.DIM_05, A.DIM_06, A.DIM_07, A.DIM_08, A.DIM_09, to_char(a.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') CREATED FROM T_MAP_ACCOUNT A
WHERE A.MAP_SET_CODE = 1 and A.ACCOUNT_CODE_FROM = #{FROM_ACCOUNT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.ACCOUNT_CODE_TO = #{TO_ACCOUNT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update T_MAP_ACCOUNT
CREATED = sysdate,
COEF = #{coef},
DATA_FETCH = #{dataFetch},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType},
CURRENCY_TYPE = #{currency},
DETAIL_TYPE1 = 'Detail_02',
DETAIL_TYPE1 = '',
DETAIL_CODE1 = #{detailCode1},
DETAIL_TYPE2 = 'Detail_03',
DETAIL_TYPE2 = '',
DETAIL_CODE2 = #{detailCode2},
DETAIL_TYPE3 = 'Detail_04',
DETAIL_TYPE3 = '',
DETAIL_CODE3 = #{detailCode3},
DETAIL_TYPE4 = 'Detail_05',
DETAIL_TYPE4 = '',
DETAIL_CODE4 = #{detailCode4},
DETAIL_TYPE5 = 'Detail_06',
DETAIL_TYPE5 = '',
DETAIL_CODE5 = #{detailCode5},
DETAIL_TYPE6 = 'Detail_07',
DETAIL_TYPE6 = '',
DETAIL_CODE6 = #{detailCode6},
DETAIL_TYPE7 = 'Detail_08',
DETAIL_TYPE7 = '',
DETAIL_CODE7 = #{detailCode7},
DETAIL_TYPE8 = 'Detail_09',
DETAIL_TYPE8 = '',
DETAIL_CODE8 = #{detailCode8},
DIM_01 = #{dim01},
DIM_02 = #{dim02},
DIM_03 = #{dim03},
DIM_04 = #{dim04},
DIM_05 = #{dim05},
DIM_06 = #{dim06},
DIM_07 = #{dim07},
DIM_08 = #{dim08},
where ACCOUNT_MAP_ID = #{mapId}
mapper.insert:
insert into T_MAP_ACCOUNT
ACCOUNT_MAP_ID,
MAP_SET_CODE,
CREATED,
COEF,
DATA_FETCH,
DATA_TYPE,
CURRENCY_TYPE,
ACCOUNT_CODE_FROM,
ACCOUNT_CODE_TO,
DETAIL_TYPE1,
DETAIL_CODE1,
DETAIL_TYPE2,
DETAIL_CODE2,
DETAIL_TYPE3,
DETAIL_CODE3,
DETAIL_TYPE4,
DETAIL_CODE4,
DETAIL_TYPE5,
DETAIL_CODE5,
DETAIL_TYPE6,
DETAIL_CODE6,
DETAIL_TYPE7,
DETAIL_CODE7,
DETAIL_TYPE8,
DETAIL_CODE8,
DIM_01,
DIM_02,
DIM_03,
DIM_04,
DIM_05,
DIM_06,
DIM_07,
DIM_08,
DIM_09,
S_T_MAP_ACCOUNT.nextval,
MAP_SET_CODE,
sysdate,
#{coef},
#{dataFetch},
#{dataType},
#{currency},
#{fromAccountCode},
#{toAccountCode},
'Detail_02',
#{detailCode1},
'Detail_03',
#{detailCode2},
'Detail_04',
#{detailCode3},
'Detail_05',
#{detailCode4},
'Detail_06',
#{detailCode5},
'Detail_07',
#{detailCode6},
'Detail_08',
#{detailCode7},
'Detail_09',
#{detailCode8},

#{dim02},
#{dim03},
#{dim04},

mapper.select: select count(*) from T_MAP_DIMTYPE A INNER JOIN T_MAP_DIMCODE B ON A.DIM_TYPE = B.DIM_TYPE AND A.DETAIL_TYPE = B.DETAIL_TYPE where A.map_set_code = 1 AND B.MAP_SET_CODE = 1 AND A.DETAIL_TYPE = #{DETAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DIM_TYPE = #{DIM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) FROM T_MAP_ACCOUNT A WHERE A.MAP_SET_CODE = 1

select A.DETAIL_TYPE,A.DIM_TYPE, B.DIM_CODE_MAP_ID, B.DETAIL_CODE, E.DETAIL_CODE_NAME,B.DIM_CODE, D.DIM_CODE_NAME, to_char(B.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') CREATED from T_MAP_DIMTYPE A INNER JOIN T_MAP_DIMCODE B ON A.DIM_TYPE = B.DIM_TYPE AND A.DETAIL_TYPE = B.DETAIL_TYPE LEFT JOIN T_FROM_DETAILCODE E ON A.DETAIL_TYPE = E.DETAIL_TYPE AND B.DETAIL_CODE = E.DETAIL_CODE AND E.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE = 1 LEFT JOIN T_TO_DIMCODE D ON A.DIM_TYPE = D.DIM_TYPE AND B.DIM_CODE = D.DIM_CODE AND D.APP_SET_CODE = 1 where A.map_set_code = 1 AND B.MAP_SET_CODE = 1 AND A.DETAIL_TYPE = #{DETAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DIM_TYPE = #{DIM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY B.DETAIL_CODE ,B.DIM_CODE

select * from ( select T.*,ROWNUM RN from ( select A.DETAIL_TYPE,A.DIM_TYPE, B.DIM_CODE_MAP_ID, B.DETAIL_CODE, E.DETAIL_CODE_NAME,B.DIM_CODE, D.DIM_CODE_NAME, to_char(B.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') CREATED from T_MAP_DIMTYPE A INNER JOIN T_MAP_DIMCODE B ON A.DIM_TYPE = B.DIM_TYPE AND A.DETAIL_TYPE = B.DETAIL_TYPE LEFT JOIN T_FROM_DETAILCODE E ON A.DETAIL_TYPE = E.DETAIL_TYPE AND B.DETAIL_CODE = E.DETAIL_CODE AND E.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE = 1 LEFT JOIN T_TO_DIMCODE D ON A.DIM_TYPE = D.DIM_TYPE AND B.DIM_CODE = D.DIM_CODE AND D.APP_SET_CODE = 1 where A.map_set_code = 1 AND B.MAP_SET_CODE = 1 AND A.DETAIL_TYPE = #{DETAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DIM_TYPE = #{DIM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY B.DETAIL_CODE ,B.DIM_CODE ) T WHERE ROWNUM <= #{END,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) where RN > #{START,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT A.ACCOUNT_MAP_ID, A.ACCOUNT_CODE_FROM, B.ACCOUNT_NAME ACCOUNT_NAME_FROM, A.ACCOUNT_CODE_TO, C.ACCOUNT_NAME ACCOUNT_NAME_TO, A.COEF, A.DATA_FETCH, case A.DATA_FETCH when 0 then '期初余额' when 1 then '借方发生额' when 2 then '贷方发生额' when 3 then '期末余额' when 4 then '借方-贷方发生额' when 5 then '贷方-借方发生额' else '' end as DATA_FETCH_NAME, A.DATA_TYPE, case A.DATA_TYPE when 0 then '金额' when 1 then '数量' when 2 then '单价' else '' end DATA_TYPE_NAME, A.CURRENCY_TYPE, case A.CURRENCY_TYPE when 0 then '本位币' when 1 then '原币' else '' end as CURRENCY_TYPE_NAME, A.DETAIL_CODE1, d1.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME1, A.DETAIL_CODE2, d2.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME2, A.DETAIL_CODE3, d3.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME3, A.DETAIL_CODE4, d4.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME4, A.DETAIL_CODE5, d5.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME5, A.DETAIL_CODE6, d6.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME6, A.DETAIL_CODE7, d7.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME7, A.DETAIL_CODE8, d8.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME8, A.DIM_01, t1.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_01, A.DIM_02, t2.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_02, A.DIM_03, t3.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_03, A.DIM_04, t4.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_04, A.DIM_05, t5.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_05, A.DIM_06, t6.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_06, A.DIM_07, t7.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_07, A.DIM_08, t8.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_08, A.DIM_09, t9.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_09, to_char(a.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') CREATED
FROM T_MAP_ACCOUNT A left join T_FROM_ACCOUNT B ON A.MAP_SET_CODE = B.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE AND A.ACCOUNT_CODE_FROM = B.ACCOUNT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_TO_ACCOUNT C ON A.MAP_SET_CODE = C.APP_SET_CODE AND A.ACCOUNT_CODE_TO = C.ACCOUNT_CODE left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d1 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d1.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE1 = d1.DETAIL_CODE and d1.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_02' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d2 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d2.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE2 = d2.DETAIL_CODE and d2.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_03' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d3 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d3.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE3 = d3.DETAIL_CODE and d3.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_04' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d4 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d4.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE4 = d4.DETAIL_CODE and d4.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_05' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d5 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d5.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE5 = d5.DETAIL_CODE and d5.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_06' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d6 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d6.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE6 = d6.DETAIL_CODE and d6.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_07' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d7 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d7.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE7 = d7.DETAIL_CODE and d7.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_08' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d8 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d8.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE8 = d8.DETAIL_CODE and d8.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_09'
left join T_TO_DIMCODE t1 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t1.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_01 = t1.DIM_CODE and t1.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_01' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t2 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t2.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_02 = t2.DIM_CODE and t2.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_02' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t3 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t3.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_03 = t3.DIM_CODE and t3.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_03' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t4 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t4.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_04 = t4.DIM_CODE and t4.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_04' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t5 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t5.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_05 = t5.DIM_CODE and t5.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_05' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t6 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t6.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_06 = t6.DIM_CODE and t6.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_06' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t7 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t7.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_07 = t7.DIM_CODE and t7.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_07' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t8 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t8.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_08 = t8.DIM_CODE and t8.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_08' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t9 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t9.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_09 = t9.DIM_CODE and t9.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_09'
WHERE A.MAP_SET_CODE = 1
order by A.ACCOUNT_CODE_FROM,A.ACCOUNT_CODE_TO

select * from ( select T.*,ROWNUM RN from ( SELECT A.ACCOUNT_MAP_ID, A.ACCOUNT_CODE_FROM, B.ACCOUNT_NAME ACCOUNT_NAME_FROM, A.ACCOUNT_CODE_TO, C.ACCOUNT_NAME ACCOUNT_NAME_TO, A.COEF, A.DATA_FETCH, A.DATA_TYPE, A.CURRENCY_TYPE, A.DETAIL_CODE1, d1.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME1, A.DETAIL_CODE2, d2.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME2, A.DETAIL_CODE3, d3.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME3, A.DETAIL_CODE4, d4.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME4, A.DETAIL_CODE5, d5.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME5, A.DETAIL_CODE6, d6.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME6, A.DETAIL_CODE7, d7.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME7, A.DETAIL_CODE8, d8.DETAIL_CODE_NAME as DETAIL_NAME8, A.DIM_01, t1.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_01, A.DIM_02, t2.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_02, A.DIM_03, t3.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_03, A.DIM_04, t4.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_04, A.DIM_05, t5.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_05, A.DIM_06, t6.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_06, A.DIM_07, t7.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_07, A.DIM_08, t8.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_08, A.DIM_09, t9.DIM_CODE_NAME as DIM_NAME_09, to_char(a.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') CREATED
FROM T_MAP_ACCOUNT A left join T_FROM_ACCOUNT B ON A.MAP_SET_CODE = B.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE AND A.ACCOUNT_CODE_FROM = B.ACCOUNT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_TO_ACCOUNT C ON A.MAP_SET_CODE = C.APP_SET_CODE AND A.ACCOUNT_CODE_TO = C.ACCOUNT_CODE left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d1 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d1.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE1 = d1.DETAIL_CODE and d1.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_02' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d2 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d2.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE2 = d2.DETAIL_CODE and d2.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_03' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d3 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d3.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE3 = d3.DETAIL_CODE and d3.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_04' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d4 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d4.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE4 = d4.DETAIL_CODE and d4.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_05' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d5 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d5.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE5 = d5.DETAIL_CODE and d5.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_06' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d6 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d6.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE6 = d6.DETAIL_CODE and d6.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_07' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d7 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d7.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE7 = d7.DETAIL_CODE and d7.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_08' left join T_FROM_DETAILCODE d8 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = d8.ACCOUNT_SET_CODE and a.DETAIL_CODE8 = d8.DETAIL_CODE and d8.DETAIL_TYPE = 'Detail_09'
left join T_TO_DIMCODE t1 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t1.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_01 = t1.DIM_CODE and t1.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_01' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t2 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t2.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_02 = t2.DIM_CODE and t2.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_02' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t3 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t3.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_03 = t3.DIM_CODE and t3.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_03' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t4 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t4.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_04 = t4.DIM_CODE and t4.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_04' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t5 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t5.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_05 = t5.DIM_CODE and t5.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_05' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t6 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t6.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_06 = t6.DIM_CODE and t6.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_06' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t7 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t7.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_07 = t7.DIM_CODE and t7.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_07' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t8 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t8.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_08 = t8.DIM_CODE and t8.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_08' left join T_TO_DIMCODE t9 on a.MAP_SET_CODE = t9.APP_SET_CODE and a.DIM_09 = t9.DIM_CODE and t9.DIM_TYPE = 'Dim_09'
WHERE A.MAP_SET_CODE = 1
order by A.ACCOUNT_CODE_FROM,A.ACCOUNT_CODE_TO ) T WHERE ROWNUM <= #{END,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) where RN > #{START,jdbcType=INTEGER}
